channel.title: Weird fourm issue
channel.description:
Alright. So every time I go on a thread that has an unread post, it redirects me to a page behind the post. The same thing happens when I try to move up a page.
(Win7/Chrome/32 bit)

item.title: Weird fourm issue
item.dc:creator: ianbrine
item.description:
danielsangeo:

I think what you’re experiencing is a “ghost page”. Typically this happens due to a post or three (or more) being removed but the forum software thinks they’re still there creating a false page.

Is it happening on all threads or just random ones?

Most threads. Not all.

Read full topic
